ISSUE.TITLE: Issue editing liquid content
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### When editing a template the liquid content fails to load ### To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to the admin site 2. Click on design, templates 3. Edit a template 4. The liquid content fails to load I believe the issue is to do with cdn's, see image below. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/76566152/120673671-4a3de280-c48b-11eb-8308-8be2b122a1e1.png)
